title: OddJobsForBitcoin
author: OddJobsForBitcoin
content: Hello everyone...I never knew that owning a website could be this profitable. I started my third website, the first to succeed in 2018. This particular site has earned me thousands of dollars and in 2 weeks from now, the site would be 4 years. To celebrate, I'm offering to write one article every other day for any member whose website is struggling. It is free!I also want to use this opportunity to promote my writing service to the community here. To participate in this bounty, please DM with your article request and also comment on this post that you did so. I will select one random request every 2 days. The topics must be about cryptocurrency. Good luck getting your free article.

comments.author: PaulBf1
comments.body: It's weird that you claim to have a website that's generating you thousands of dollars but not so long ago you were offering to do "odd" jobs for bitcoin: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5202814.msg53264218#msg53264218For someone who's making thousands of dollars, it's a bit  strange to be offering "odd" services.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Maybe I am interested in the free article,  also to test and see if truly, you means the things you say.I wish to write an article about a crypto currency exchange,  please note that I am not the owner of the exchange,  I am just a user and wish to promote the exchange through my referral link,  so this is to point out that you will be using my referral link in the article.I wil make you a deal actually,  we will discuss that in pm if you are interested in this,  give me a reply here and I will give you a pm.

comments.author: OddJobsForBitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on August 25, 2022, 10:42:34 PMMaybe I am interested in the free article,  also to test and see if truly, you means the things you say.I wish to write an article about a crypto currency exchange,  please note that I am not the owner of the exchange,  I am just a user and wish to promote the exchange through my referral link,  so this is to point out that you will be using my referral link in the article.I wil make you a deal actually,  we will discuss that in pm if you are interested in this,  give me a reply here and I will give you a pm. Hey, please send details of the review inbox.

comments.author: Cryptogames999
comments.body: Can you write on travel niche?

comments.author: OddJobsForBitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptogames999 on August 27, 2022, 05:19:07 PMCan you write on travel niche?QuoteThe topics must be about cryptocurrency.The site I'm celebrating is crypto based.
